welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Doraville, a charming city known for its rich history and diverse culture. Get ready to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and charter flights, as well as flight training and aircraft maintenance services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminals and can be accessed using the network name provided.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as a restaurant, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport is used for private and charter flights and includes facilities for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
